column5: Heading down to sunny FLA next month and am looking to hook-up and do some bassin'. Any suggestions on guides would be appreciated.  Thanks!

I heard Scott Martin (The Scott Martin Challenge) does guiding in that area and he is really reasonable. Looks like he might be a fun guy to fish with. Might be worth investigating, after all he is the son of legend Roland Martin.
Interesting idea - looks like he is guiding out of Rolands marina on Lake 'O'.  I'm looking for something a bit closer to Orlando.
I can highly recommend John Swan a.k.a. Swanny http://www.swannysbassguides.com/index.htm  We went out last fall about 20 minutes from Orlando and had a blast.
Well, we're going with this one...  http://www.bassfishingfl.com  Post and Pics to come.  :-)
